          <title>
            <string language="en">Friedel-Crafts-type reaction of benzene with chloromethane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friedel-Fertigkeit-Typ Reaktion des Benzols mit 
Chloromethane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Friedel-Métier-type réaction de benzène avec 
du chlorométhane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Friedel-Ofício-tipo reação de benzene com 
chloromethane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Friedel-Mestiere-tipo reazione di benzene con 
clorometano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φρηεδελ-τέχνη-τύπος αντίδραση του βενζολίου με το 
χλωρομεθάνιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Friedel-Arte-tipo reacción de benceno con 
clorometano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the equation of the reaction of benzene with a halogen carrier, chloromethane, forming methylbenzene.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">friedel-crafts-type reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">benzene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chloromethane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">halogen carrier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">methylbenzene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Gleichung der Reaktion 
des Benzols mit einer Halogenfördermaschine, der Chloromethane und 
bildet Methylbenzol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'équation de la 
réaction du benzène avec un porteur d'halogène, chlorométhane, 
formant le méthylbenzène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a equação da reação 
do benzene com um portador do halogênio, chloromethane, dando forma 
ao methylbenzene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'equazione della 
reazione di benzene con un elemento portante dell'alogeno, 
clorometano, formante il metilbenzene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την εξίσωση της 
αντίδρασης του βενζολίου με έναν μεταφορέα αλόγονου, 
χλωρομεθάνιο, που διαμορφώνει methylbenzene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la ecuación de la 
reacción del benceno con un portador del halógeno, clorometano, 
formando el methylbenzene.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friedel-Fertigkeittyp Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Benzol</string>
          </keyword>
